sentences.en: "That's kind of you, Sally," Claire said gratefully.
sentences.cn: “你真是太好心了，萨莉，”克莱尔感激地说道。

sentences.en: A tap on the door interrupted him and Sally Pierce came in.
sentences.cn: 敲门声打断了他，萨莉·皮尔斯走了进来。

sentences.en: But watch out for a duck I call Sally.
sentences.cn: 不过请注意一只被我叫做萨莉的鸭子。

sentences.en: Felicity (to Sally): I guess what I’m saying is this might all be a colossal mistake, as my dad would say, but on the other hand it may…maybe it’ll save my life or something.
sentences.cn: 费利西蒂(对莎莉说): 我猜我想要说的这个可能是个巨大的错误，如同我爸爸说的那样，但是另一方面也许……也许它可拯救我的生命或者别的什么。

sentences.en: Not content with rescuing one theatre, Sally Green has taken on another.
sentences.cn: 萨莉·格林不满足于挽救一家剧院，她又接手了另外一家。
萨莉饶有兴趣地打量着克莱尔。

sentences.en: Sally got wind of the rumours about her.
sentences.cn: 萨利风闻关于她的谣言.

sentences.en: Sally spun round, a feigned look of surprise on her face.
sentences.cn: 萨莉急转过身来，脸上装出一副吃惊的表情。

sentences.en: Sally was amused, but I was very embarrassed.
sentences.cn: 萨莉很开心, 但我却很尴尬.

sentences.en: Sally was ecstatic about her new job.
sentences.cn: 萨莉对她的新工作高兴得发狂。

sentences.en: She was pretty unforthcoming. Made Sally wait till she'd cooked Selby's lunch, if you please.
sentences.cn: 她爱搭不理地把萨莉晾在一边，直到她为塞尔比做好午饭，你说怪不怪。

sentences.en: Tamara would sally out on bitterly cold nights.
sentences.cn: 塔玛拉会不畏严寒在夜晚外出。

sentences.en: The foreign minister has become everybody's favourite Aunt Sally.
sentences.cn: 外交部长已成为众矢之的。

sentences.en: There's no point having wishes if you don't at least try to do them.--Sally Nicholls
sentences.cn: 有理想，却不愿为之努力，那只是空想。

sentences.en: They had a huge row and Sally moved out of the house.
sentences.cn: 他们大吵一架之后萨莉搬了出来。

sentences.en: What about Sally? You've missed her out.
sentences.cn: 萨莉呢？你把她给漏掉了。
